detail_desc: Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups and a cut-out section at the front. Wider, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Light support.
Fitted dress in a soft knit with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Earrings in metal with round pendants on rods. Length 7.3 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid to give your favourite items in silk, wool and other delicate materials the treatment they deserve. Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 14 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
Double-breasted jacket in jersey with notch lapels, a tapered waist and buttons at the front. Welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Dungaree dress in soft stretch denim with adjustable straps with press-studs. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, press-studs at the sides and one back pocket. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Short, V-neck dress in a patterned weave with a wrapover front with ties at one side and concealed press-studs at the other. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Short skirt in crinkled chiffon with an elasticated waist and small frill trim at the top. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
Shorts in cotton poplin with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. One pair with an all-over print.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Set with a short-sleeved top and pair of treggings. Top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in a crêpe weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with a button at the waist and zip fly. Patch front pockets, fake flap pockets at the back and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Straight-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wrapover front with a belt and metal D-rings at one side.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. The zip has a chin guard. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of all-in-one suit is organic.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short fitted dress in glittery patterned velour with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and a seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt.
Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Long-sleeved shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.

Short dress in a slightly stretchy, textured weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, double-layered puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist and  fake front pockets.
Set with three pairs of studs and four ear cuffs made of metal in various sizes and designs.

Imitation leather boots with a zip in the side, lacing and a lightly padded tongue with an embossed motif at the top. One tab with a buckle and button stud on the front and another on the shaft. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a mesh section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.
Long-sleeved wrap dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a flounce that continues down the front. Seam with ties under the bust, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Tunic in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Elasticated seam under the bust, dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and decorative straps at the back. Lined.
Slightly wider leather belt with an antiqued metal buckle. Width 4.5 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight, knee-length legs.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, two back pockets and skinny legs.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a wrapover front that has a button at one side and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Short, flounced sleeves and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Sarong in patterned satin. Size 130x150 cm.
Blouse in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated, trumpet cuffs with decorative bows. Short slits in the sides.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sock boots with round toes, a zip at the top and covered heels. Mesh linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a button placket.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Jumper in a cable-knit wool and cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Glittery tulle skirt with an elastic waistband. Lined.
Mittens in soft faux fur with ribbed cuffs. Soft cotton jersey lining.
Swim pants and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Print-patterned top with long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with a frill at the top and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a sequin-embroidered motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-style, pleated blouse in airy chiffon with a frilled stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Lined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with a regular waist, a ribbed section on the inside at the back of the waist and a concealed drawstring at the front. Zip fly and slim legs.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and an unlined hood with a decorative drawstring. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Lace briefs with an elasticated trim at the waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Suede boots with a knee-high shaft that has a small slit at the top. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Fitted lace dress with a V-neck front and back, lace cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the front and lined skirt.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.Overlocked edges at the top, cuffs and hem.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Round opening with a decorative drawstring at the back and an asymmetric hem at the back.

Narrow, adjustable waist belt in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a metal buckle. Two fixed pouches, one larger and one smaller with fasteners. Width of belt approx. 1.3 cm. Size of larger pouch approx. 10x17 cm. Size of smaller pouch approx. 10x10 cm.

Soft body in microfibre and lace with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lace sections with decorative, covered buttons at the back. High-cut legs, a high cut at the back and lined gusset with press-studs.
Swim top and long trousers in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist. UPF 50.

Blouse in softly draping satin with a small, gathered stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front. Covered buttons down the front, wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with faux fur pompoms on the top, a turned-up hem, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Short fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front panel with a tie detail.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
